display_html: signalProperty ∷ ∀ a. Int → (a → String) → (a → Bool) → Signal a → Property
name: signalProperty

display_html: timeout ∷ ∀ a. DiffTime → (a → Bool) → Signal a → Signal Bool
name: timeout

display_html: difference ∷ (a → a → b) → Signal a → Signal (Maybe b)
name: difference

display_html: scanl ∷ (b → a → b) → b → Signal a → Signal b
name: scanl

display_html: keyedTimeout ∷ ∀ a b. Ord b ⇒ DiffTime → (a → Set b) → Signal a → Signal (Set b)
name: keyedTimeout

display_html: keyedLinger ∷ ∀ a b. Ord b ⇒ DiffTime → (a → Set b) → Signal a → Signal (Set b)
name: keyedLinger

display_html: keyedUntil ∷ ∀ a b. Ord b ⇒ (a → Set b) → (a → Set b) → (a → Bool) → Signal a → Signal (Set b)
name: keyedUntil

name: runSimGen

name: monadicSim

display_html:
class Serialise a where
  • encode ∷ a → Encoding
  • decode ∷ Decoder s a
  • encodeList ∷ [a] → Encoding
  • decodeList ∷ Decoder s [a]
name: Serialise encode decode decodeList encodeList

display_html: prop_serialise ∷ (Serialise a, Eq a, Show a) ⇒ a → Property
name: prop_serialise

display_html: prop_serialise_roundtrip ∷ (Serialise a, Eq a, Show a) ⇒ a → Property
name: prop_serialise_roundtrip

display_html: arbitrarySubset ∷ Ord a ⇒ Set a → Gen (Set a)
name: arbitrarySubset

name: prop_shrink_valid

display_html: prop_shrink_nonequal ∷ (Arbitrary a, Eq a) ⇒ Fixed a → Property
name: prop_shrink_nonequal

display_html:
data WithName name event = WithName {
  • wnName ∷ name
  • wnEvent ∷ event
}
name: WithName WithName wnName wnEvent

display_html:
data WithTime event = WithTime {
  • wtTime ∷ Time
  • wtEvent ∷ event
}
name: WithTime WithTime wtTime wtEvent

display_html: tracerWithName ∷ name → Tracer m (WithName name a) → Tracer m a
name: tracerWithName

display_html: tracerWithTime ∷ MonadMonotonicTime m ⇒ Tracer m (WithTime a) → Tracer m a
name: tracerWithTime

display_html: tracerWithTimeName ∷ MonadMonotonicTime m ⇒ name → Tracer m (WithTime (WithName name a)) → Tracer m a
name: tracerWithTimeName

display_html: splitWithNameTrace ∷ Ord name ⇒ Trace r (WithName name b) → Trace r [WithName name b]
name: splitWithNameTrace

display_html: debugTracer ∷ (Show a, Applicative m) ⇒ Tracer m a
name: debugTracer

display_html: sayTracer ∷ (Show a, MonadSay m) ⇒ Tracer m a
name: sayTracer

display_html: initScript ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ Script a → STM m (TVar m (Script a))
name: initScript

display_html: stepScript ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TVar m (Script a) → m a
name: stepScript

display_html: stepScriptSTM ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TVar m (Script a) → STM m a
name: stepScriptSTM

display_html: stepScriptOrFinish ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TVar m (Script a) → m (Either a a)
name: stepScriptOrFinish

display_html: stepScriptOrFinishSTM ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TVar m (Script a) → STM m (Either a a)
name: stepScriptOrFinishSTM

display_html: initScript' ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ Script a → m (TVar m (Script a))
name: initScript'

display_html: stepScript' ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TVar m (Script a) → m a
name: stepScript'

display_html: stepScriptSTM' ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TVar m (Script a) → STM m a
name: stepScriptSTM'

display_html: playTimedScript ∷ (MonadAsync m, MonadTimer m) ⇒ Tracer m a → TimedScript a → m (TVar m a)
name: playTimedScript

display_html:
data PickMembers peeraddr
  • = PickFirst
  • | PickAll
  • | PickSome (Set peeraddr)
name: PickMembers PickFirst PickAll PickSome

display_html: interpretPickScript ∷ (MonadSTM m, Ord peeraddr) ⇒ TVar m (PickScript peeraddr) → Set peeraddr → Int → STM m (Set peeraddr)
name: interpretPickScript

display_html:
data AbsAttenuation
  • = NoAttenuation AbsSpeed
  • | SpeedAttenuation AbsSpeed Time DiffTime
  • | ErrorInterval AbsSpeed Time DiffTime
name: AbsAttenuation NoAttenuation SpeedAttenuation ErrorInterval

display_html:
data AbsBearerInfo = AbsBearerInfo {
  • abiConnectionDelay ∷ !AbsDelay
  • abiInboundAttenuation ∷ !AbsAttenuation
  • abiOutboundAttenuation ∷ !AbsAttenuation
  • abiInboundWriteFailure ∷ !(Maybe Int)
  • abiOutboundWriteFailure ∷ !(Maybe Int)
  • abiAcceptFailure ∷ !(Maybe (AbsDelay, AbsIOErrType))
  • abiSDUSize ∷ !AbsSDUSize
}
name: AbsBearerInfo AbsBearerInfo abiConnectionDelay abiInboundAttenuation abiOutboundAttenuation abiInboundWriteFailure abiOutboundWriteFailure abiAcceptFailure abiSDUSize
